pages.title: Woodland Staff
pages.text: The woodland staff is a creative tool that allows you to copy and paste tree states.$(br2)It can be obtained by using the /dt createstaff command, or by getting it from the creative menu.$(br2)You can then set/reset the target species by right clicking a tree, or set/reset the tree and JoCode (growth shape) by shift right clicking a tree.
Also note that although this is a creative tool, it has an axe harvest level of 3, making it a fast tool for cutting down trees.
